document.full_text: the u.n. atomic watchdog has received further information regarding activities that "seem to point to the existence" of possible military dimensions to iran's nuclear program, the agency's head said on monday.
document.title: new data suggests iran military link: u.n. atom chief
lines_and_colors: the u.n. atomic watchdog has received further information regarding activities that "seem to point to the existence" of possible military dimensions to iran's nuclear program, the agency's head said on monday.
